name: Documenting Designs: A Tiled Approach to Project Guides
description:
Organization is critical to any project. If your project has many moving pieces and may need a bit more clarity, this tiled approach could work great for you and your team.


If your project doesn't need a robust approach, check out this simple project guide.


--


If you want to read more on this approach to project guides, check out this post on the SEP Blog.
